Class PathValidator

extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains validators to path.
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro

        Check image exists in images folder.
        Parameters:
        image - Name of image file with or without file extension.

        String Name of image file with extension or empty string if doesn't exist.

        Check icon exists in images folder.

        public static boolean themeExist(java.lang.String theme)
        Check theme exists in themes folder.
        Parameters:
        theme - Name of theme without extension.
        Returns:
        boolean Exist or doesn't exist in themes folder.

      • patternExist

        public static java.lang.String patternExist(java.lang.String directoryPattern,
                                            java.lang.String pattern)
        Check pattern exists in patterns folder.
        Parameters:
        directoryPattern - Folder into pattern folder where is pattern.
        pattern - Name of pattern with or without extension.
        Returns:
        String Path complete to pattern or empty string if doesn't exist.

      • tempFileExist

        public static java.lang.String tempFileExist(java.lang.String jsonFile)
        Check file exists in temp folder.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • customBulletOrMarkerExist

        public static java.lang.String customBulletOrMarkerExist(java.lang.String custom)
        Check custom bullet or custom marker exists in images folder.
        Parameters:
        custom - Name of custom bullet or marker with or without file extension.
        Returns:
        Path of bullet/marker or empty string if doesn't exist.
